subject: Fw: Thank you, we will help you fight out the cash crunch
body:
Your credit doesn't matter to us!
 
If you OWN property and want IMMEDIATE pin money to spend ANY way you like, or simply wish to LOWER your monthly payments by a third or more, here is the deal we can offer you TONIGHT (hurry, this tender will expire THIS NIGHT):
 
$278,000+ debt
 
AND EVEN MORE: After further review, our lenders have set the lowest payments!
 
Hurry, when best deal is gone, it is gone. Simply complete this short form... 
 
Don't worry about approval, your your credit report will not disqualify you!
 
http://ahhsyuewj.com/
